column3: I am a Space Conversational Agent for Retrieving Lessons-learnt and Expert Training.
column4: My two main functions are knowledge capture and knowledge retrieval in the form of lessons learned.
column5: If I ever get stuck please use /restart to restart the conversation.,How can I help?, What do you know about Buzz Aldrin?: I'm processing your request.
